name: Kare no Jinsei
description:
Kare no Jinsei is a humoristic visual novel where the protagonist has amnesia and want to discover about him, but on his way he will encounter a series of surreal events that will make him doubt about his existence and everything he has experienced so far.

Will you be able to discover the truth about everything that awaits you?

---DISCLAIMER---

This game still work in progress, some parts seem incomplete or not fully understood

We regret you if it's not what you expected, we will improve all the changes we have pending to upload it as soon as possible.

We highly recommend download the game to have a better experience.
